description: This course is designed to assist you, as an employee, or and employer, to better understanding have to develop and maintain strong management and employee relations. We will discuss both Union and Non Union environments, communicating with each other, setting goals, and basic negotiating tips. The student taking this course will have a better understanding of communications, the goals of management and the employee, the chain of communications, modern day thinking and basic negotiations. This course is narrated power point presentation. This should should be taken by any employee, or new supervisor, as well as experienced supervisors for review. This course lasts approximately 35 minutes.
title: Employee Relations Skills
